scripts.build: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- keystone build && dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- keystone prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:diff: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- keystone prisma migrate create
scripts.db:migrate:dev: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- keystone prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.production -- keystone prisma generate --binary-targets native,rhel-openssl-3.0.x
